scripts.typechain: typechain --target ethers-v5 --outDir src/contracts/pos './artifacts/*.json' && typechain --target ethers-v5 --outDir src/contracts/util './node_modules/@cartesi/util/artifacts/*.json'
scripts.clean: rimraf artifacts && rimraf cache && rimraf deployments && rimraf src/types/*

scripts-info.typechain: Generate TypeScript code to interact with Smart Contracts, powered by TypeChain
scripts-info.clean: Clean build artifacts, including contracts deployment information

scripts-info.deploy:development: Deploy contracts to local ganache. Requires ganache running on localhost:8545
